questions.question: True or False: The serial number is required for all brewer issues?
For Order issues, which one of these fields are you required to fill out in the Service Request?
For order issues, what is the maximum number of beverage boxes/bags you are empowered to send?
Customer states their order status shows “processing” and they placed their order 3 days ago. Choose area and subarea.

choices.answer: Order Inquiry / Stuck in Processing/Late Ship
Order Inquiry / Tracking Shows No Movement

questions.question: Customer states they ordered only 2 boxes of Barista Prima Italian Roast but received 3 boxes. Choose area and subarea.

choices.answer: Order Inquiry / Keurig Order Missing Product

questions.question: True or False, the customer purchased their brewer on Keurig.com, which means the asset exists in Siebel.
What field on the Asset record is used to show if the brewer was purchased on Keurig.com?
Customer’s MBG request is for an Keurig.com order placed 45 days ago, what do you do?

choices.answer: Notify the customer they will receive their money in 3-4 weeks
Notify the customer they can’t get their money back

questions.question: Pick the best resolution: Customer states they are missing 4 boxes of Starbucks Pike Place in their just received order.

choices.answer: Tell customer to wait 3 more days and maybe it will come
Offer a coupon for the 4 boxes they are missing
Transfer to Eteam as it is out of your empowerment

questions.question: True or False, if the serial number exists in Siebel, then there is no need to verify the number with the customer
